name: WP Easy Image Slider
author: Ahir Hemant

sections.description:
Create Simple Wp Image Slider and add Multiple images.
WP Easy Image Slider Plugin allows to create Multiple Slider With that you can Upload Multiple Images. after Addning you get Shortcode With Id For the Particular Slider.By You can Use this shortcode in your post/page and Also In page template.
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘WP Easy Image Slider’ to the wordpress admin
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Open WP Image Slider and add a slide
  4. Upload Multiple Images
sections.faq:
Que1.How install plugin in my WordPress site ?

Ans1. Now its easy please follow this link and you will found best solution https://codex.wordpress.org/Managing_Plugins

Que2. How to use WP Easy Image Slider plugin ?

its very Easy [wp_easy_image_slider id=67] where id = Your Slider Id

Que3. Is is possible to display multiple slider on single page/post?

yes.

Que3.How can i used This shortcode In Template ?

You can Simply add this Php Code: echo do_shortcode(‘[wp_easy_image_slider id=67]’);

short_description: Simple Image Slide permits users to create Image Slide Show.
